episodes.name: Copenhagen
episodes.overview: Trying to prove he's not the mole at his agency, an analyst makes a discovery that upends his life.

episodes.name: Glass House
episodes.overview: Alexander and The Orphanage are forced to work together, building a trap with Alexander as the bait.

episodes.name: False Flag
episodes.overview: Alexander must decide if he will sacrifice a real mission in order to hunt the hackers.

episodes.name: Obsidian
episodes.overview: In a mission where nothing is as it seems, Alexander must save a Source's life by risking his own.

episodes.name: Looking Glass
episodes.overview: When a trap for the enemy blows up, Alexander follows his own mission plan and risks everything.

episodes.name: Allegiance
episodes.overview: Alexander is given an impossible choice; The Orphanage must decide if he has turned on them.

episodes.name: Not the World of Men
episodes.overview: Hunted by his own agency, Alexander must stay alive to save those whom he holds most dear.

episodes.name: The Orphanage
episodes.overview: As Alexander races against the clock, Parker discovers a secret message hiding in plain sight.
